title: The Attraction
description: College students make a wrong turn into nightmare country in this all-out drive-in horror movie of a book from New York Times bestselling author Douglas Clegg. For fans of Richard Matheson, Guillermo del Toro and Stephen King.The Dark Coming of Age series books do not need to be read in any specific order -- they are stand-alones built around a theme of "dark coming of age."
author: Douglas Clegg
